snippet: A prominent Ethiopian politician arrested after meeting European lawmakers last year has pleaded not guilty to inciting unrest in a country that remains under a state of emergency after anti-government protests....

headline.main: Ethiopia Opposition Leader Charged With Inciting Unrest
headline.print_headline: Ethiopia Opposition Leader Charged With Inciting Unrest

lead_paragraph: A prominent Ethiopian politician arrested after meeting European lawmakers last year has pleaded not guilty to inciting unrest in a country that remains under a state of emergency after anti-government protests.
